/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the image, perhaps due to the absence of people or the orderly arrangement of the buildings. It's a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, where tradition and modernity coexist harmoniously.
